lead_paragraph: Spanish rider Pol Espargaro is following Tech3 Yamaha team mate Bradley Smith to KTM in a deal announced by the MotoGP debutants on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Pol Espargaro to Race for KTM in 2017
headline.main: Pol Espargaro to Race for KTM in 2017
